Surface Color Style
===================



```
concept {
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyleShading_0
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyleShading_1
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Styles -> IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Name -> IfcLabel_1
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Name -> IfcLabel_3
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Side -> IfcSurfaceSide_0
    IfcSurfaceStyle:Side -> IfcSurfaceSide_1
    IfcSurfaceStyleShading_0:SurfaceColour -> IfcColourRgb_0
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:SurfaceColour -> IfcColourRgb_1
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:Transparency -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_3
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:DiffuseColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_0
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:TransmissionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_1
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:DiffuseTransmissionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_2
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:ReflectionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_3
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:SpecularColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_4
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:SpecularHighlight -> IfcSpecularExponent_0
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_0:ReflectanceMethod -> IfcReflectanceMethodEnum_0
    IfcColourRgb_1:Name -> IfcLabel_0
    IfcColourRgb_1:Red -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_0
    IfcColourRgb_1:Green -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_1
    IfcColourRgb_1:Blue -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_2
    IfcSurfaceStyleShading_1:SurfaceColour -> IfcColourRgb_2
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:SurfaceColour -> IfcColourRgb_3
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:Transparency -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_7
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:DiffuseColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_5
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:TransmissionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_6
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:DiffuseTransmissionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_7
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:ReflectionColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_8
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:SpecularColour -> IfcColourOrFactor_9
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:SpecularHighlight -> IfcSpecularExponent_1
    IfcSurfaceStyleRendering_1:ReflectanceMethod -> IfcReflectanceMethodEnum_1
    IfcColourRgb_3:Name -> IfcLabel_2
    IfcColourRgb_3:Red -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_4
    IfcColourRgb_3:Green -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_5
    IfcColourRgb_3:Blue -> IfcNormalisedRatioMeasure_6
}
```
